title: Mcp-Server-Llamacloud
description: A TypeScript-based MCP server for connecting to a managed knowledge base index on LlamaCloud.
creator: run-llama

LLAMA_CLOUD_INDEX_NAME.description: The name of the index in LlamaCloud to connect to.

LLAMA_CLOUD_PROJECT_NAME.description: The project name associated with the index in LlamaCloud.

LLAMA_CLOUD_API_KEY.description: The API key for authenticating with LlamaCloud.
